title: GROMACS Simulation Schema
description: This schema defines the structure of metadata and parameters used in a GROMACS simulation environment.

creator.title: Creator of the dataset or data curator

publishing_institution.description: Institution that published the dataset. Use the ROR ID (https://ror.org/) if available
publishing_institution.title: Publishing Institution

protein_id.title: Protein Identification
protein_id.description: Enter either the PDB ID or the Uniprot ID, more than one protein can be entered

ligand_id.title: Ligand Identification
ligand_id.description: Enter a ligand identifier from a recognized database

concentration.title: Solvent Concentration
concentration.description: Concentration of the solvent in the simulation box in mol/L

simulation_level_data.title: Simulation Level Data
simulation_level_data.description: Contains GROMACS simulation parameters (mdp fields), including force fields and input records.

forcefield.title: Force Field
forcefield.description: Specifies the force field used for the simulation (e.g., 'AMBER99SB', 'CHARMM36', etc.).

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: A reference to the primary GROMACS input or configuration file name.

inputrec.title: MDP Input Record
inputrec.description: Collection of GROMACS parameters typically found in an .mdp file.

integrator.title: Integrator
integrator.description: Defines the type of integrator (e.g., 'md', 'sd', 'md-vv', etc.).

tinit.title: Initial Time
tinit.description: Sets the starting time (in ps) of the simulation.

nsteps.title: Number of Steps
nsteps.description: Total number of simulation steps to perform.

init-step.title: Initial Step
init-step.description: Index of the initial step (allows continuation runs).

simulation-part.title: Simulation Part
simulation-part.description: Helps GROMACS handle continuation runs by labeling parts of the simulation.

mts.title: MTS
mts.description: Specifies multi-time stepping parameters if used.

mass-repartition-factor.title: Mass Repartition Factor
mass-repartition-factor.description: Factor used when repartitioning masses in a simulation.

comm-mode.title: Center of Mass Communication Mode
comm-mode.description: Method for removing center of mass motion (e.g., 'Linear', 'Angular').

nstcomm.title: COM Removal Frequency
nstcomm.description: Frequency to remove center of mass motion in steps.

bd-fric.title: Brownian Dynamics Friction
bd-fric.description: Used when integrator is BD; friction constant.

ld-seed.title: Random Seed for LD/SD
ld-seed.description: Seed for the random number generator used in Langevin/Brownian dynamics.

niter.title: Number of Iterations
niter.description: Used for certain iterative algorithms in energy minimization.

fcstep.title: Force Constant Step
fcstep.description: Step for the force constant in energy minimization cycles.

nstcgsteep.title: Conjugate Gradient Frequency
nstcgsteep.description: Steps between CG updates in steepest descent minimization.

nbfgscorr.title: Number of BFGS Corrections
nbfgscorr.description: Used by BFGS minimization to set the maximum number of corrections.

rtpi.title: Time between rtp calculations
rtpi.description: Useful parameter in integrator algorithms controlling certain updates.

nstxout.title: Position Output Frequency
nstxout.description: Frequency in steps for writing coordinates to trajectory.

nstvout.title: Velocity Output Frequency
nstvout.description: Frequency in steps for writing velocities to trajectory.

nstfout.title: Force Output Frequency
nstfout.description: Frequency in steps for writing forces to trajectory.

nstlog.title: Log Output Frequency
nstlog.description: Frequency in steps for writing to the GROMACS log file.

nstcalcenergy.title: Energy Calculation Frequency
nstcalcenergy.description: Frequency in steps for calculation of energies.

nstenergy.title: Energy Output Frequency
nstenergy.description: Frequency in steps for writing energies to the energy file.

nstxout-compressed.title: Compressed Trajectory Output Frequency
nstxout-compressed.description: Frequency in steps for writing compressed coordinates (xtc).

compressed-x-precision.title: Compressed X Precision
compressed-x-precision.description: Precision in bits for compressed trajectories.

nstlist.title: Neighbor List Update Frequency
nstlist.description: Number of steps between construction of the neighbor list.

pbc.title: Periodic Boundary Conditions
pbc.description: Dimension(s) along which periodic boundary conditions are applied.

periodic-molecules.title: Periodic Molecules
periodic-molecules.description: Whether molecules are treated as periodic objects.

verlet-buffer-tolerance.title: Verlet Buffer Tolerance
verlet-buffer-tolerance.description: Controls size of the buffered pair list in Verlet scheme.

verlet-buffer-pressure-tolerance.title: Verlet Buffer Pressure Tolerance
verlet-buffer-pressure-tolerance.description: Allows for a dynamic pair-list resizing under pressure coupling.

rlist.title: Neighbor List Cutoff
rlist.description: Cutoff for the neighbor list in nm.

rcoulomb-switch.title: Coulomb Switch Distance
rcoulomb-switch.description: Distance at which the Coulomb potential begins switching.

rcoulomb.title: Coulomb Cutoff
rcoulomb.description: Distance at which the Coulomb potential is truncated or switched.

epsilon-r.title: Dielectric Constant
epsilon-r.description: Relative dielectric constant of the medium.

epsilon-rf.title: Reaction-Field Dielectric
epsilon-rf.description: Value of the dielectric constant used for reaction-field calculations.

vdw-type.title: van der Waals Type
vdw-type.description: Method for treating van der Waals interactions (e.g., 'Cut-off', 'Shift').

rvdw-switch.title: VdW Switch Distance
rvdw-switch.description: Distance at which the van der Waals potential starts to switch.

rvdw.title: VdW Cutoff
rvdw.description: Distance at which the van der Waals potential is truncated or switched.

table-extension.title: Table Extension
table-extension.description: Extension of lookup tables beyond the cutoff for custom interactions.

fourierspacing.title: Fourier Spacing
fourierspacing.description: Grid spacing for PME in nm.

fourier-nx.title: PME Grid Points (X)
fourier-nx.description: Number of x-direction grid points for PME.

fourier-ny.title: PME Grid Points (Y)
fourier-ny.description: Number of y-direction grid points for PME.

fourier-nz.title: PME Grid Points (Z)
fourier-nz.description: Number of z-direction grid points for PME.

pme-order.title: PME Interpolation Order
pme-order.description: Order of the interpolation for PME (e.g., 4).

ewald-rtol.title: Ewald Tolerance
ewald-rtol.description: Accuracy tolerance for Ewald summation or PME.

ewald-rtol-lj.title: Ewald Tolerance (LJ)
ewald-rtol-lj.description: Accuracy tolerance for LJ-PME or Ewald correction for LJ.

lj-pme-comb-rule.title: LJ PME Combination Rule
lj-pme-comb-rule.description: Defines how combining rules for LJ interactions are handled under PME.

epsilon-surface.title: Surface Dielectric Constant
epsilon-surface.description: Effective dielectric at the surface for Ewald-based methods.

ensemble-temperature-setting.title: Temperature Setting
ensemble-temperature-setting.description: Description of how temperature is controlled (e.g., 'Berendsen', 'Nose-Hoover').

ensemble-temperature.title: Ensemble Temperature
ensemble-temperature.description: Target temperature for the system in Kelvin.

nsttcouple.title: Temp. Coupling Frequency
nsttcouple.description: Number of steps between temperature coupling updates.

nh-chain-length.title: Nose-Hoover Chain Length
nh-chain-length.description: Number of thermostats in the Nose-Hoover chain.

print-nose-hoover-chain-variables.title: Print NH Chain Variables
print-nose-hoover-chain-variables.description: If 'yes', prints Nose-Hoover chain variables in the log.

pcoupltype.title: Pressure Coupling Type
pcoupltype.description: Defines isotropic, semi-isotropic, or anisotropic coupling.

nstpcouple.title: Pressure Coupling Frequency
nstpcouple.description: Number of steps between pressure coupling updates.

tau-p.title: Pressure Time Constant
tau-p.description: Coupling time constant for pressure regulation.

compressibility (3x3).title: Compressibility Matrix
compressibility (3x3).description: 3x3 matrix describing compressibility for each dimension.

ref-p (3x3).title: Reference Pressure Matrix
ref-p (3x3).description: 3x3 matrix specifying reference pressure(s) in each dimension.

refcoord-scaling.title: Reference Coordinate Scaling
refcoord-scaling.description: Determines how coordinates are scaled under pressure coupling.

posres-coms.title: Position Restraints (Coms)
posres-coms.description: 3-element array for controlling positions via center of mass restraints.

posres-comBs.title: Position Restraints (ComBs)
posres-comBs.description: 3-element array for controlling positions of another group via center of mass restraints.

QMMM.title: QMMM
QMMM.description: Flag indicating quantum mechanics/molecular mechanics approach usage.

qm-opts.title: Quantum Mechanics Options
qm-opts.description: Additional parameters for QM or hybrid QM/MM simulations in GROMACS.

ngQM.title: Number of QM Groups
ngQM.description: Defines how many groups are treated quantum mechanically.

continuation.title: Continuation Run
continuation.description: Specifies if this run is a continuation from a previous simulation.

Shake-SOR.title: Shake-SOR
Shake-SOR.description: Option to use successive over-relaxation with SHAKE constraints.

shake-tol.title: Shake Tolerance
shake-tol.description: Tolerance level for the SHAKE algorithm.

lincs-order.title: LINCS Order
lincs-order.description: Expansion order used in the LINCS constraint algorithm.

lincs-iter.title: LINCS Iterations
lincs-iter.description: Number of iterative correction steps in LINCS.

lincs-warnangle.title: LINCS Warning Angle
lincs-warnangle.description: Threshold angle for issuing LINCS warnings.

nwall.title: Number of Walls
nwall.description: Controls the inclusion of walls in the simulation box.

wall-r-linpot.title: Wall Linear Pot. Radius
wall-r-linpot.description: Distance threshold for linearization in wall potential.

wall-atomtype[0].title: Wall Atom Type 0
wall-atomtype[0].description: Atom type used to represent wall 0.

wall-atomtype[1].title: Wall Atom Type 1
wall-atomtype[1].description: Atom type used to represent wall 1.

wall-ewald-zfac.title: Wall Ewald Z-Factor
wall-ewald-zfac.description: Factor used in Ewald summation for walls.

pull.title: Pull Code
pull.description: Option to activate pulling simulations (umbrella sampling, steered MD, etc.).

awh.title: AWH
awh.description: Activated weight histogram method for free energy calculations.

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: Allows rotating constraints or biasing in free energy calculations.

interactiveMD.title: Interactive MD
interactiveMD.description: Specifies if the simulation is run in interactive mode.

disre.title: Distance Restraints
disre.description: Controls whether distance restraints are used.

disre-weighting.title: Distance Restraints Weighting
disre-weighting.description: Describes how distance restraints are weighted.

disre-mixed.title: Distance Restraints Mixed
disre-mixed.description: Combines multiple distance restraints in a single potential if set.

dr-fc.title: Distance Restraint Force Constant
dr-fc.description: Force constant used for distance restraints.

dr-tau.title: Distance Restraint Time Constant
dr-tau.description: Time constant for exponential averaging in distance restraints.

nstdisreout.title: Distance Restraint Output Frequency
nstdisreout.description: Number of steps between writing distance restraint data.

orire-tau.title: Orientation Restraint Time Constant
orire-tau.description: Time constant for orientation restraint averaging.

nstorireout.title: Orientation Restraint Output Frequency
nstorireout.description: Number of steps between writing orientation restraint data.

free-energy.title: Free Energy
free-energy.description: Controls free-energy perturbation or expanded ensemble simulations.

cos-acceleration.title: Acceleration in Cosine Space
cos-acceleration.description: Used in certain advanced sampling or nonequilibrium methods.

deform (3x3).title: Deformation Matrix (3x3)
deform (3x3).description: 3x3 matrix for deforming the simulation box over time.

simulated-tempering.title: Simulated Tempering
simulated-tempering.description: Flag and parameters for simulated tempering method.

swapcoords.title: Swap Coordinates
swapcoords.description: Coordinates can be swapped between replicas in REMD or other advanced methods.

applied-forces.title: Applied Forces Section
applied-forces.description: Contains sub-sections for external/applied forces such as electric fields or density-guided simulations.

electric-field.title: Electric Field
electric-field.description: Definition of applied electric fields in x, y, z directions.

x.title: Electric Field (X)
x.description: Parameters for the electric field along the X axis.

t0.title: Start Time
t0.description: Time at which the field is turned on.

sigma.title: Width Parameter
sigma.description: Used if the field has a Gaussian or other shape in time.

y.title: Electric Field (Y)
y.description: Parameters for the electric field along the Y axis.

t0.title: Start Time
t0.description: Time at which the field is turned on.

sigma.title: Width Parameter
sigma.description: Used if the field has a Gaussian or other shape in time.

z.title: Electric Field (Z)
z.description: Parameters for the electric field along the Z axis.

t0.title: Start Time
t0.description: Time at which the field is turned on.

sigma.title: Width Parameter
sigma.description: Used if the field has a Gaussian or other shape in time.

density-guided-simulation.title: Density Guided Simulation
density-guided-simulation.description: Enables and configures density-guided MD with specified reference density.

active.title: Active
active.description: Turns density-guided simulation on or off.

group.title: Atom Group
group.description: Specifies the group of atoms or molecules for density guidance.

similarity-measure.title: Similarity Measure
similarity-measure.description: Metric used for comparing current and reference densities.

atom-spreading-weight.title: Atom Spreading Weight
atom-spreading-weight.description: Weight distribution function for atoms in the density grid.

force-constant.title: Force Constant
force-constant.description: Defines the strength of the restraining force based on density.

gaussian-transform-spreading-width.title: Spreading Width
gaussian-transform-spreading-width.description: Width of the Gaussian spread used to construct the density map.

gaussian-transform-spreading-range-in-mu.title: Spreading Range
gaussian-transform-spreading-range-in-mu.description: Extent of the spread around each atom in multiples of the width.

reference-density-filename.title: Reference Density Filename
reference-density-filename.description: Path to the file holding the reference density distribution.

nst.title: Update Frequency
nst.description: Frequency (in steps) at which the density force is updated.

normalize-densities.title: Normalize Densities
normalize-densities.description: Whether to normalize both reference and current densities before comparison.

adaptive-force-scaling.title: Adaptive Force Scaling
adaptive-force-scaling.description: Option to scale the restraining force adaptively.

adaptive-force-scaling-time-constant.title: Adaptive Scaling Time Constant
adaptive-force-scaling-time-constant.description: Time constant for adjusting the adaptive force scale.

shift-vector.title: Shift Vector
shift-vector.description: Vector to shift the reference density in space.

transformation-matrix.title: Transformation Matrix
transformation-matrix.description: Matrix to rotate or scale the reference density.

qmmm-cp2k.title: QM/MM CP2K Interface
qmmm-cp2k.description: Controls the QM/MM interface if using CP2K as the QM engine.

active.title: Active
active.description: Turns the QM/MM CP2K interface on or off.

qmgroup.title: QM Group
qmgroup.description: Specifies which group of atoms is treated quantum mechanically.

qmmethod.title: QM Method
qmmethod.description: The quantum mechanical method or basis set used (in CP2K terms).

qmfilenames.title: QM Filenames
qmfilenames.description: Paths or patterns for files needed by CP2K (input, etc.).

qmcharge.title: QM Charge
qmcharge.description: Net charge of the QM region.

qmmultiplicity.title: QM Multiplicity
qmmultiplicity.description: Spin multiplicity of the QM system.

colvars.title: Collective Variables Module
colvars.description: Interface to a colvars-like module for advanced sampling (e.g., NAMD colvars).

active.title: Active
active.description: Turns the colvars module on or off.

configfile.title: Configuration File
configfile.description: Specifies the external configuration file for colvars.

seed.title: Random Seed
seed.description: Seed for any stochastic processes within colvars.

grpopts.title: Group Options
grpopts.description: Options for temperature groups and coupling settings.

nrdf.title: Number of Degrees of Freedom (Groups)
nrdf.description: Defines the degrees of freedom per temperature group.

ref-t.title: Reference Temperature (Groups)
ref-t.description: Target temperature for each group in Kelvin.

tau-t.title: Temperature Coupling Time Constants
tau-t.description: Time constants for temperature coupling of each group in ps.

annealing.title: Annealing Method (Groups)
annealing.description: Defines annealing method (e.g., 'single', 'periodic') for temperature groups.

annealing-npoints.title: Number of Annealing Points
annealing-npoints.description: Defines how many points are used for each group's annealing schedule.

acc.title: Acceleration for Groups
acc.description: Acceleration (in nm/ps^2) applied to different groups along x, y, z directions.

nfreeze.title: Freeze Groups
nfreeze.description: Specifies whether (and how) certain groups are frozen in x, y, z directions.

energygrp-flags.title: Energy Group Flags
energygrp-flags.description: Specifies which energy terms to store or print for certain groups.

header.title: Run Header
header.description: General header information for the simulation run.

bIr.title: IR Data Flag
bIr.description: Indicates presence of an input record for reading.

bBox.title: Box Flag
bBox.description: Indicates presence of box dimension data.

natoms.title: Number of Atoms
natoms.description: Total number of atoms in the simulation.

lambda.title: Lambda
lambda.description: Coupling parameter for free energy calculations or scaling interactions.

buffer size.title: Buffer Size
buffer size.description: Size of buffer used for storing coordinate/velocity/force data.

box (3x3).title: Box Matrix (3x3)
box (3x3).description: Simulation box vectors in a 3x3 matrix.

box_rel (3x3).title: Relative Box Matrix (3x3)
box_rel (3x3).description: Box vectors relative to some reference, if used.

boxv (3x3).title: Box Velocity (3x3)
boxv (3x3).description: Time derivatives of box vectors if the box is changing in time.

pres_prev (3x3).title: Previous Pressure Tensor (3x3)
pres_prev (3x3).description: Pressure tensor from the previous step, stored for coupling continuity.

svir_prev (3x3).title: Previous Virial (3x3)
svir_prev (3x3).description: Virial tensor from the previous step, used in pressure calculations.

fvir_prev (3x3).title: Previous Full Virial (3x3)
fvir_prev (3x3).description: Full virial tensor from the previous step, used for continuity in coupling.

nosehoover_xi.title: Nose-Hoover Xi
nosehoover_xi.description: Variable associated with the Nose-Hoover thermostat chain.

Group statistics.title: Group Statistics
Group statistics.description: Records of how many atoms belong to each relevant group used in the simulation.

T-Coupling.title: Temperature Coupling Group
T-Coupling.description: Statistics about the group used for temperature coupling.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms belonging to this temperature coupling group.

Energy Mon..title: Energy Monitor Group
Energy Mon..description: Group used for energy monitoring or additional output.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms belonging to this group.

Acc. not used.title: Acceleration Not Used
Acc. not used.description: Statistics for the group not subjected to acceleration.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms in the group that does not use acceleration.

Freeze.title: Freeze Group
Freeze.description: Group of atoms that are frozen in some or all dimensions.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of frozen atoms in the group.

User1.title: User Group 1
User1.description: Custom user-defined group 1 for specialized statistics or manipulations.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this user group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms in this user-defined group.

User2.title: User Group 2
User2.description: Custom user-defined group 2 for specialized statistics or manipulations.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this user group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms in this user-defined group.

VCM.title: Center of Mass Group
VCM.description: Group used to handle or remove center of mass motion.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms used for center of mass calculations in this group.

Compressed X.title: Compressed Coordinates Group
Compressed X.description: Specifies the group for which compressed coordinates might be written.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms whose coordinates may be compressed.

Or. Res. Fit.title: Orientational Restraint Fit Group
Or. Res. Fit.description: Group of atoms used for orientation restraint fitting or alignment.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms used for orientation restraints or RMSD fitting.

QMMM.title: QM/MM Group
QMMM.description: Group of atoms under QM treatment in hybrid simulations.

atoms.title: Atom Indices
atoms.description: List of atom indices in this QM/MM group.

total atoms.title: Total Atoms in Group
total atoms.description: Number of atoms in the QM/MM group.

system_level_data.title: System Level Data
system_level_data.description: Describes the overall system setup, such as water model and box dimensions.

water_model.title: Water Model
water_model.description: The water model used in the simulation (e.g., 'TIP3P', 'SPC/E').

box_size_and_shape.title: Box Dimensions
box_size_and_shape.description: Size of the simulation box in x, y, z dimensions (in nm).

software_information.title: Software Information
software_information.description: Details of the software environment used to perform the simulation.

software.title: Software Name
software.description: Name of the molecular dynamics package (e.g., 'GROMACS').
